roleset.name: to schedule programming to compete with another show

role.descr: programming used to counterprogram, counterprogrammed with

example.name: Args 0 and 2
example.text: Instead , network officials say , it may `` counterprogram '' with shows for an audience that is virtually ignored in that time period : adults .
example.arg: shows for an audience that is virtually ignored in that time period : adults

example.name: args 0 & 1
example.text: And remember [McPherson]-1 is a demonstrated fan of making bold, aggressive scheduling gestures -- PRO-1 moving "Grey's Anatomy" against "CSI," filling Wednesdays with three new shows in 2007, being the first network in years to counterprogram the Super Bowl.

roleset.note: COUNTERPROGRAM-V NOTES: Based on instances in WSJ- NW. Framed by Claire. (from counterprogram.01-v)
